nodes.text: The Living Galaxy: Flawed Gems Shine The Brightest

The Living Galaxy: Flawed Gems Shine The Brightest was an article written by Roger E. Moore and published in Polyhedron 63. It was accompanied by an illustration by Andrew Ellis commissioned for The New Rogues Gallery: Unsung Heroes of the Rebellion in Polyhedron 59. Like all supplements printed in Polyhedron prior to 2002, the article is considered ambiguously canon.
